nodes.text: Rekya was a female inspector on the planet Nakadia. She was the chief inspector of the team of Nakadians who searched New Republic Senator Tolwar Wartol's ship for restricted agricultural products when it was revealed that Chancellor Mon Mothma had smuggled a pta fruit aboard in order to delay their arrival at the Quarrow Senate house.
Rekya first appeared in the 2017 novel Aftermath: Empire's End written by Chuck Wendig.
